skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. The first hit has a 20% chance of filling this Champion’s Turn Meter by 10%. The second hit has a 20% chance of decreasing the target’s Turn Meter by 10%.
skills.name: Gilded Weapons
skills.books:
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +5%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%

skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. The first hit places a [Shield] equal to 25% of the damage inflicted on all allies for 2 turns. The second hit heals all allies by 10% of the damage inflicted.
skills.name: Splattering Hacks
skills.books:
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +5%
Lvl. 5 Cooldown -1Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +100%

skills.desc:
Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. The first hit has a 75% chance of placing a 50% [Decrease ATK] debuff for 2 turns and a 75% chance of removing any [Increase ATK] buffs from the target.

The second hit has a 75% chance of placing a 60% [Decrease DEF] debuff for 2 turns and a 75% chance of removing any [Increase DEF] buffs from the target.
